overview: Wendy Receptionist began from a simple question that came out of necessity: “Why can’t we run our business from wherever we want to?” When we began to look into answering the more detailed aspects (i.e. the “how”) of this question, we ended up turning these nuts and bolts into our current business. A lot determination, many late nights, and several additional team members later, Wendy was born. She is a Virtual Receptionist that runs your Virtual Office so that you can manage your company wherever you are, whenever you need to. With functionality that allows for any and all documents and data to be sent to your Virtual Office Address to be organized and/or forwarded to whom ever you like, and that’s just the basics. For more visit us at http://www.wendyreceptionist.com/
